document_data.mainbody:
ollebu was a small village located on the island of Norland within the Moonshae Isles.
Follebu sat along the northern fringes of the South Jotunhammer Mountains within the region of Norland called Grondsgrunn which was controlled by giants. The village was found at the end of a long unnamed bay on the islands western coast on the Trackless Sea.
